name: Voidmender
description:
Everyone knows aliens have an obsession with human experimentation. But why did they have to pick you? Can you manage to escape and find a way back home in this first-person puzzle game?

Voidmender is still very early in development. Our goals are:

  1. Currently: Developing the core gameplay mechanics along with a level editor
  2. Next: Use the level editor to design a wide variety of puzzles
  3. Next: Improve the graphics, models, music, and sound
  4. Finally: Tie all those pieces together into a single-player campaign with a funny story

Download today and enjoy the levels we've created so far, or use the level editor to create puzzles for others!
